name: flash-fire

effect.sun_moon: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
